    R

    Recipe - dao.mappers中的类
    Recipe entity class representing a recipe in the recipe management system.
    Recipe() - 类的构造器 dao.mappers.Recipe
    Default constructor for Recipe.
    Recipe(int, String, int, int, int) - 类的构造器 dao.mappers.Recipe
    Constructor for Recipe with basic information.
    Recipe(int, String, int, int, int, String) - 类的构造器 dao.mappers.Recipe
    Constructor for Recipe with basic information and image URL.
    RecipeCreateFXMLController - control中的类
    RecipeCreateFXMLController manages the user interface and business logic for recipe creation and editing.
    RecipeCreateFXMLController() - 类的构造器 control.RecipeCreateFXMLController
     
    RecipeCreateView - view中的类
    RecipeCreateView is a JavaFX Stage that provides the user interface for creating and editing recipes.
    RecipeCreateView() - 类的构造器 view.RecipeCreateView
    Default constructor for creating a new recipe.
    RecipeCreateView(int) - 类的构造器 view.RecipeCreateView
    Constructor for editing an existing recipe.
    RecipeDisplayFXMLController - control中的类
    RecipeDisplayFXMLController manages the user interface for displaying recipe details.
    RecipeDisplayFXMLController() - 类的构造器 control.RecipeDisplayFXMLController
     
    RecipeDisplayView - view中的类
    RecipeDisplayView is a JavaFX Stage that provides the user interface for displaying recipe details.
    RecipeDisplayView(Integer) - 类的构造器 view.RecipeDisplayView
    Constructor for displaying a specific recipe.
    recipeImage - 类中的变量 view.RecipeCreateView
     
    RecipeIngredient - dao.mappers中的类
    RecipeIngredient represents an ingredient used in a recipe with its nutritional information.
    RecipeIngredient() - 类的构造器 dao.mappers.RecipeIngredient
    Default constructor for RecipeIngredient.
    RecipeIngredient(int, String, Float, String, String) - 类的构造器 dao.mappers.RecipeIngredient
    Constructor for RecipeIngredient with basic information.
    RecipeIngredient(int, String, Float, String, String, Float, Float, Float, Float) - 类的构造器 dao.mappers.RecipeIngredient
    Constructor for RecipeIngredient with complete nutritional information.
    RecipeIngredient(RecipeIngredient) - 类的构造器 dao.mappers.RecipeIngredient
    Copy constructor for RecipeIngredient.
    RecipeIngredientMapper - dao.mappers中的接口
    MyBatis mapper interface for RecipeIngredient entity operations.
    RecipeMapper - dao.mappers中的接口
    MyBatis mapper interface for Recipe entity operations.

    RecipeSelectFXMLController manages the main recipe selection interface.

    RecipeSelectView - view中的类
    JavaFX Stage class for the recipe selection view of the recipe management application.
    RecipeSelectView() - 类的构造器 view.RecipeSelectView
    Constructor that initializes the recipe selection view window.
    RecipeService - model中的类
    RecipeService provides comprehensive business logic for recipe management operations.

    Constructor for RecipeService.
    resetLastDisplayedAlert() - 类中的静态方法 model.Model
    Resets the last displayed alert to null for testing purposes.
